snippet: American Airlines’s cargo warehouse at Kennedy Airport processes a million pounds of goods every day, giving a preview of everything from fashions to economic trends.
abstract: American Airlines cargo warehouse at Kennedy Airport processes a million pounds of goods every day, giving workers a preview of everything from fashions to economic trends.
lead_paragraph: American Airlines’s cargo warehouse at Kennedy Airport processes a million pounds of goods every day, giving a preview of everything from fashions to economic trends.

headline.seo: Cargo Workers at Kennedy Airport Get a Glimpse of the Future
headline.main: At Kennedy, Cargo Workers See the Future
headline.print_headline: At Kennedy, Cargo Workers See the Future
